TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DetailsViewCommandEventHandler(object sender, DetailsViewCommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DetailsViewCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DetailsViewCommandEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DetailsViewCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void DetailsViewCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DetailsViewCommandEventArgs ^ e);
type DetailsViewCommandEventHandler = delegate of obj * DetailsViewCommandEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 、或行字段中的按钮时,控件引发事件。 The control raises the event when a button within a , , or row field is clicked. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理程序, 该事件处理程序将在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 单击某些按钮时, 该控件还会引发其他专用事件 ( `CommandName`属性设置为 "删除"、"插入"、"页面" 或 "更新") 的按钮。The control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Insert", "Page", or "Update"). 使用其中一个按钮时, 应考虑使用控件提供的专用事件之一 (如或)。When using one of these buttons, you should consider using one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as or ). 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将委托添加到控件的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. 此示例使用单文件编码模型。This example uses the single-file coding model. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCommandEventHandlerCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventHandlerCodeInline/CS/DetailsViewCommandEventHandlerInlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCommandEventHandlerCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventHandlerCodeInline/VB/DetailsViewCommandEventHandlerInlinevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示上一示例的代码隐藏编码模型版本。The following code example shows a code-behind coding model version of the previous example. 要使此示例正常运行, 必须将下面的代码复制到关联的代码隐藏文件中。For this example to work, you must copy the code below into the associated code-behind file. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCommandEventHandlerCodeBehind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/detailsviewcommandeventhandlercodebehind/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCommandEventHandlerCodeBehind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/detailsviewcommandeventhandlercodebehind/VB/DefaultVB.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例显示了上一示例的代码隐藏文件。The following code example shows the code-behind file for the previous example. [!code-csharp[DetailsViewCommandEventHandlerCodeBehind#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/detailsviewcommandeventhandlercodebehind/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DetailsViewCommandEventHandlerCodeBehind#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/detailsviewcommandeventhandlercodebehind/VB/DefaultVB.aspx.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式将委托添加到控件的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewItemCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewItemCommand/CS/detailsviewitemcommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewItemCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewItemCommand/VB/detailsviewitemcommandvb.aspx#1)]
